name: TankiFier - Endless Tank Battle
description:
▶ Join the best Epic Tank Battle on the AppStore, now coming to Itch.io!

Play alone against endless waves of tanks or play with your friends and dominate them in a one against one battle.

And the best part of it: It's 100% FREE!

5/5 - average AppStore reviews

◆◆◆◆◆ - Fun to play. At first it's hard but when you get used to playing you won't stop. Addictive!!!

◆◆◆◆◆ - My favorite new game. Super addictive and fun, plus has a great design. Definitely a must for any game enthusiast.

◆◆◆◆○ - Great endless game! I can play this for hours! Thanks

▶ STORY

You are the lone survivor in a world of war. It is your job to destroy the enemy tanks as much as possible. But they keep coming! Try to stay alive as long as possible.

▶ GAME-MODES

  • EASY - Aim automatically, take less damage, easier gameplay
  • HARD - Do everything for yourself, insane boss battles

    • ▶ FEATURES

  • Endless waves of tanks
  • Beautiful detailed and unique environments
  • Upgradeable tank statistics
  • Epic boss battles
  • Hostile tanks
  • Save your progress

    • ▶ ABOUT

  • TankiFier - Endless Tank Battle started as a debut for entering the AppStore with high quality content. The game is developed and designed with love and patience by Arjo Nagelhout, a 15 years old game developer.
  • If you have any questions, please contact me - arjo.nagelhout@gmail.com
  • For more information go to my website - arjonagelhout.weebly.com
